des: Cyberpunk doesn’t need an introduction by me, I didn’t invent it. Google Mike Pondsmith, he’ll tell you. Hopefully I can update this skill with breaking news about this game from the devs themselves and this game only. Easily the most anticipated game in the last decade it was being made. The Original “Cyberpunk 2020” is an obscure pen & paper game from the eighties. Night City awaits with the freedom to be you.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
